Opt's examples use 4 external libraries. We summarize their licenses here, the full text of the licenses can be found in the individual libraries subdirectories.

Eigen 3.3 beta 1 - Licensed under the MPL2, which is a simple weak copyleft license. (https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/)

mLib - Like Opt, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

nanoflann - BSD 2 clause License

OpenMesh 5.0 - BSD 3 clause license
